name: properties_count
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool seloger.
Tool description: This API helps to query properties for sale or rent in France to create a real estate site/application such as seloger.com
API description: Count the total number of properties available based on the given search parameters and filters.

zipcodes.description: Either zipCodes OR districtIds parameter is required. The postal code, separated by comma for multiple values. Ex : 75,13,...

bedrooms.description: Filter by number of bedrooms (1-5), separated by commas for multiple values (e.g., '2,3').

rooms.description: Filter by number of bedrooms (1-5), separated by commas for multiple values (e.g., '2,3').

sortby.description: One of the following : 0-Pertinence | 1-Prix croissant | 2-Prix decroissant | 10-Du + recent au + ancien | 9-Du + ancien au + recent | 5-Surface croissante | 6-Surface decroissante

includenewconstructions.description: Whether to include new constructions in the listing.

minimumfloor.description: Filter by minimum number of floors.

districtids.description: Either zipCodes OR districtIds parameter is required. The value of id fields under 'districts' JSON object returned in .../locations/search endpoint. Separated by comma for multiple values. Ex : 133051,133137,...

maximumfloor.description: Filter by maximum number of floors.

realtytypes.description: One of the following : 1-Appartement | 2-Maison et Villa | 2048-Chateau | 128-Loft/Atelier/Surface | 4096-Hotel Particulier | 4-Parking/Box | 8-Terrain | 512-Immeuble | 1024-Batiment | 16-Boutique | 32-Local Commercial | 64-Bureau
